sequence.container-title: 115,SUPPLEMENTARY NOTES ! 10. ABSTRACT The documentevaluates and assesses scientific information on the health and welfare effects associated with exposure to various concentrations of sulfur oxides and particulate matter in ambient air.
sequence.note: The literature through 1980-81 has been reviewed
